ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Nostrolo tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: Had a guild party camping the one in Kaesora for about five to six hours. The mob that drops it only spawned twice and never had the coin.  We were the only
ygData.messageBody:
Had a guild party camping the one in Kaesora for about five to six hours.
The mob that drops it only spawned twice and never had the coin. We were
the only people in Kaesora at the time so at least there were enough mobs
to keep us happy. Have had the other five coins in the bank for probably a
year now.


At 07:12 AM 1/7/02 -0800, you wrote:
>
> Good quest -- easier and harder than you might think. If you have a good
>guild that raids a bit, look to hit City of Mist, Kaesora and get a good
>group together to hunt scorpikus's in the canyon in the Overthere (beware
>the harm touch) --
>Otherwise you can buy these coins for varying amounts. I have seen the
>Kaesora coin auctioned for up to 400pp -- too much IMHO but it is probably
>the hardest to come by.
>If you are going to buy the coins though -- a walrus skin drum goes for 1K
>on Rodcet Nife and probably similar amounts elsewhere. It is a better drum
>and if you have the cash on hand, takes a lot less time to get )
>Best of Luck
>Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
>Bard of 55 missed notes
> Katye and Brandon <landmax13@...> wrote: Anyone done the rare coins
>quest in FV? Any hints?
>
>I have the box and the bloodgill coin so far...
>
>
>Raub
>33rd lvl songster
>E. Marr
>
